author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

Backporting
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47324

Includes
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47628
* Resolved merge conflict as for 15_1, so this PR can go either after or instead of that, please consult with @hqucms 

#### PR validation:

Passing new unit tests

```
Pass   38s ... PhysicsTools/NanoAOD/test-btvNano-run                                                                                                                                                      
Pass    3s ... PhysicsTools/NanoAOD/test-btvNano-check                                               
>> Test sequence completed for CMSSW CMSSW_15_0_X_2025-03-23-2300  
```
title: btvNano backports (15_0_X)
